issue.title: [C++] Add/document configuration to build with WebAssembly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6894](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6894). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not something I plan to work on, but given that https://github.com/finos/perspective created a custom wasm build of Arrow, it would seem a good idea to have a standard way for wasm projects to use the Arrow C++ library
